text: Nicanor Parra Sandoval (5 September 1914 - 23 January 2018) was a Chilean poet, mathematician and physicist. He was considered to be an influential poet in Latin America and one of the most important poets of Spanish literature.Radio Universidad de Chile Parra had been nominated several times for a Nobel Prize in Literature. Parra died on January 23, 2018, at 7:00 am, in La Reina, Chile, at the age of 103. ==References== ==Other websites== *Nicanor Parra Official website *Nicanor Parra website at the Universidad de Chile *Nicanor Parra: De los Antipoemas a los Artefactos Dramáticos – Madrid *La Antipoesía de Parra y el lenguaje del artefacto UNESCO Category:1914 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Chilean poets Category:Chilean centenarians Category:Physicists Category:Mathematicians Category:Chilean scientists Category:Ñuble Region Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Nicanor Parra
